trans-unit.source: Free 30 day trial of Azure RemoteApp
trans-unit.target: Free 30 day trial of Azure RemoteApp

trans-unit.source: Check out the 30 day free trial for Azure RemoteApp.
trans-unit.target: Check out the 30 day free trial for Azure RemoteApp.

trans-unit.source: Free 30 day trial of Azure RemoteApp
trans-unit.target: Free 30 day trial of Azure RemoteApp

trans-unit.source: If you have an Azure subscription, you can try [Azure RemoteApp free for 30 days](https://www.remoteapp.windowsazure.com/en/tour.aspx).
trans-unit.target: If you have an Azure subscription, you can try [Azure RemoteApp free for 30 days](https://www.remoteapp.windowsazure.com/en/tour.aspx).

trans-unit.source: To start, simply sign in to the Azure Management Portal, navigate to the Azure RemoteApp node, and then create a collection.
trans-unit.target: To start, simply sign in to the Azure Management Portal, navigate to the Azure RemoteApp node, and then create a collection.

trans-unit.source: This is a great way to test drive the full administrative experience before converting to a paid subscription of Azure RemoteApp.
trans-unit.target: This is a great way to test drive the full administrative experience before converting to a paid subscription of Azure RemoteApp.

trans-unit.source: While in trial mode, you can create two collections with a 10 user per collection limit.
trans-unit.target: While in trial mode, you can create two collections with a 10 user per collection limit.

trans-unit.source: You can convert your trial to a paid subscription at any time.
trans-unit.target: You can convert your trial to a paid subscription at any time.

trans-unit.source: After 30 days your collections will go into disabled state if you don’t convert to paid subscription.
trans-unit.target: After 30 days your collections will go into disabled state if you don’t convert to paid subscription.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] The Azure SLA does not apply to collections created in trial mode.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] The Azure SLA does not apply to collections created in trial mode.

trans-unit.source: Watch a quick video on how to [create a cloud deployment](http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/videos/azure-remoteapp-cloud-deployment-overview/).
trans-unit.target: Watch a quick video on how to [create a cloud deployment](http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/videos/azure-remoteapp-cloud-deployment-overview/).

trans-unit.source: If you have an [Azure support plan](http://azure.microsoft.com/support/plans/), you can submit a support case.
trans-unit.target: If you have an [Azure support plan](http://azure.microsoft.com/support/plans/), you can submit a support case.

trans-unit.source: Everyone can submit feedback on our [Feedback forum](http://feedback.azure.com/forums/247748-azure-remoteapp).
trans-unit.target: Everyone can submit feedback on our [Feedback forum](http://feedback.azure.com/forums/247748-azure-remoteapp).
